Package it.seba.juno.deck

Class DiscardPile

java.lang.Object
it.seba.juno.deck.DiscardPile
public class DiscardPile extends Object
Discard pile for the Uno game, a place where to put played cards.
Author:
Sebastian Rapetti

    • dropToPile

      public void dropToPile(UnoCard card)
      Permit to drop a card on top of the DiscardPile.
      Parameters:
      card - card to drop on top of the pile.

    • cardMatch

      public boolean cardMatch(UnoCard card)
      Check if a card can be dropped to the discard pile, check for both value and color.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to check.
      Returns:
      true if card can be dropped, false otherwise.

    • cardMatchColor

      public boolean cardMatchColor(UnoCard card)
      Check if a card can be dropped to the discard pile, check for color.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to check.
      Returns:
      true if card can be dropped, false otherwise.

    • cardMatchValue

      public boolean cardMatchValue(UnoCard card)
      Check if a card can be dropped to the discard pile, check for value.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to check.
      Returns:
      true if card can be dropped, false otherwise.

    • setCurrentColor

      public void setCurrentColor(UnoColor color)
      Set the current color in drop pile, used to keeping track of the current color to check before card drop.
      Parameters:
      color - the new current color.

    • getCurrentColor

      public UnoColor getCurrentColor()
      Return the current color of the discard pile.
      Returns:
      the current color.

    • getTopCard

      public UnoCard getTopCard()
      Return the top card of the discard pile but dosn't remove it from the pile.
      Returns:
      the current top card.

    • removeTopCard

      public UnoCard removeTopCard()
      Return the top card of the discard pile and remove it from the pile.
      Returns:
      the current top card.

    • reset

      public List<UnoCard> reset()
      Reset the discard pile, all cards except the top card are removed, use this to refill the deck when it is empty.
      Returns:
      a list of all cards in discard pile.
